name: Jungle Jorney
description: Jungle Jorney - platformer with a pleasant musical accompaniment. The main character must find a key at each level to open the door to the next level. In this case, you will have to avoid contact with the spikes and enemies that will meet you on the road. The pleasant atmosphere and simplicity of the gameplay is aimed at players of the youngest age, and will brighten up the game a couple of evenings for a pleasant game.
